definitions.definition: Any rodent of the family Sciuridae , distinguished typically by a large bushy tail.
Someone who displays squirrel-like qualities such as stealing or hoarding objects.
One of the small rollers of a carding machine which work with the large cylinder .
A person, usually a freezoner , who applies L. Ron Hubbard's technology in a heterodox manner.

main_definition: Any rodent of the family Sciuridae , distinguished typically by a large bushy tail.
secondary_definitions: Someone who displays squirrel-like qualities such as stealing or hoarding objects.
One of the small rollers of a carding machine which work with the large cylinder .
( Scientology , often derogatory ) A person, usually a freezoner , who applies L. Ron Hubbard's technology in a heterodox manner.
